root: ^A small green fairy is floating in the air.
^It seems like she's playing, with the wind?
^"Excuse me... Are you Sylph, one of the four elemental spirits?"
^"(Celsus lifts his hat, revealing his face.)"
^"I'm not a giant hat... I'm a human. My name is Celsus."
^"Yes! You got it right! Do you need something from me, sir Celsus?"
^"Of course, I intent to make a contract with you and borrow your powers."
^"Hmm... I see... And what exactly do you plan to use my power for?"
^"(Celsus stays silent for a bit before answering)"
^"I- I want to become stronger so I can make a name for myself!"
^"Hihihi♪ such a selfish reason♪ but... I know your intentions are not evil."
^"What, How can you be so sure?"
^"But... You know a weak human can't make a contract with spirits."
^"...Rather, a weak human cannot handle it's power."
^"But it's alright for Celsus♪ I know you're capable♪"
^"Now give me your hand. I will grant you my power."
^I hold out my hand, and as Sylph touches it, a slight breeze can be felt and a white glow appears.
^I can feel it, the breeze around me. I can hear the wind whispering to me...
^Every sound, every movement. They told me everything...
^My body feels light, it's like a weight has been lifted off my shoulders, as if I'm one with the wind itself...
^So this is the power of a spirit...
^"From now on, my wind will dance for you."
